title: Bakrid
plot: A man develops friendship with a camel, and has to embark on a journey with the animal.

A young struggling farmer who takes a loan to run his day to day life from an elderly Muslim man. On the occasion of _Bakrid_ (qv) festival, he witnesses a camel and two calves being brought in for the festival purposes and decides to save the younger one. The calf becomes a part of his family and the farmer forms a strong emotional bond with it.::Santhosh
